lesson.title: Volume and Surface Area
lesson.body:
In this lesson we'll be looking at Volume and surface areas: when thinking about the surface area, you essentially calculate the outer area: 
 Here we'll go over the basics of some simple 3 dimensional shapes 
 Surface Area of a Cube: Edge Length x Edge Length x 6 
 Area of a Cube: Edge Length x Edge Length x Edge Length 
 Area of a Cylinder: Radius ^ 2 x Pi x Height or Area of the circle x height
